params.name: num_encoder_blocks
params.description: The number of encoder blocks (i.e. stages in the Mix Transformer encoder).

params.name: depths
params.description: The number of layers in each encoder block.

params.name: sequence_reduction_ratios
params.description: Sequence reduction ratios in each encoder block.

params.name: hidden_sizes
params.description: Dimension of each of the encoder blocks.

params.name: patch_sizes
params.description: Patch size before each encoder block.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in each block of the Transformer encoder.

params.name: mlp_ratios
params.description: Ratio of the size of the hidden layer compared to the size of the input layer of the Mix FFNs in theencoder blocks.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the encoder and pooler. If string, gelu,relu, selu and gelu_new are supported.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the embeddings, encoder, and pooler.

params.name: attention_probs_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: drop_path_rate
params.description: The dropout probability for stochastic depth, used in the blocks of the Transformer encoder.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: qkv_bias
params.description: Whether or not a learnable bias should be added to the queries, keys and values.
